dc:title: The Listener
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Commentary on social conditions of the wealthy J.P. Morgan, of working men and women, and the increasing evictions. Describes the reactions of Communists and others to the initial issue of The Catholic Worker on May 1st.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 267 1933-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
